overview: In the year 2008, Ann and Nianci are two good friends, growing up together in the small town, south of China. With the arrival of the plum-rain season, Nianci's mother came and took her to the city faraway. Ann saw the departure of her friend as a kind of betrayal. However, she could neither change the reality,nor convince her to stay. In the midst of her anger, Ann found that she could scarcely bear the absence of Nianci, so much that she developed some kind of hidden feelings for her. At the same time, Nianci seemed to notice these feelings as well.
title: Farewell in the Rainy Season
